long_description: You don't need to be a brainiac to recognize the advantages of working out in the SmartWool PhD Run T-shirt. Merino wool and nylon blend wicks moisture to help maintain a comfortable temperature when you're on the move. Strategically placed flatlock seams minimize chafing and increase comfort. Unlike traditional wool, SmartWool items do not itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Smartwool items are naturally antimicrobial, preventing the funky odors traditionally associated with standard workout wear. The semifitted SmartWool PhD Run T-shirt for men is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: You don't need to be a brainiac to recognize the advantages of working out in the SmartWool PhD Run T-shirt.
